channel.title: Terminal on TheAbyss
channel.description: Recent content in Terminal on TheAbyss

item.title: Terminal: tldr
item.description: This week tip of the week is on the cool terminal application called tldr. What is tldr? This is a simple tool that allows you to look up commands in a simple way, think man pages but more accessible. Although nothing beats the sheer depth of the man pages the tldr have something even greater. It supports help pages for non-native apps. This in itself makes tldr something interesting. Without wasting time lets get down to some show and tell.
